explain: Customize the look and feel of your login, user management, organization portal and emails.
formHelpLogoUrl: Enter a valid URL to a hosted image file. The file must be publicly accessible via the web.
formHelpAppIconUrl: Enter a valid URL to a hosted image file. The file must be publicly accessible via the web. It should be a square image suitable for a mobile device icon.
formHelpFaviconUrl: Enter a valid URL to a hosted image file. The file must be publicly accessible via the web.
primaryColorHelp: Primary color to be used. Must be a hex value.
secondaryColorHelp: Secondary color to be used. Must be a hex value.
backgroundColorHelp: Background color to be used. Must be a hex value.
cssHelp: Custom CSS. Will override any other values.
formHelpHtmlTemplate: HTML email template. Most email clients will show and render this version.
portal_profile_enabled_tooltip: Profile feature flag allows users to access the profile page.
portal_profile_password_enabled_tooltip: Profile password feature flag allows users to update their password.
portal_profile_twofactor_enabled_tooltip: Profile two-factor feature flag allows users to setup 2FA.
portal_profile_activity_enabled_tooltip: Profile activity feature flag allows users to see their activity.
portal_profile_linked_enabled_tooltip: Profile linked feature flag enables users to create a link.
portal_org_enabled_tooltip: Organizations feature flag allows users to utilize the organizations feature.
portal_org_details_enabled_tooltip: Organization details feature flag allows users to view details about the organization.
portal_org_members_enabled_tooltip: Organization members feature flag allows members to be viewed by the user.
portal_org_invitations_enabled_tooltip: Organization invitations feature flag allows organization invitations to be sent out.
portal_org_domains_enabled_tooltip: Organization domains feature flag allows domains to be added and configured for a domain.
portal_org_sso_enabled_tooltip: Organization SSO feature flag allows SSO to be setup and configured.
portal_org_events_enabled_tooltip: Organization events feature flag allows user to view organization activity.
